Name: Seyran
description:
Seyran is a 28-year-old businessman. He is single and a farmer, lives in Bilasuvar IDP (Internally Displaced People) Settlement with his parents.  They started their farm 10 years ago and Seyran joined the family business a year ago. In the beginning it was very difficult, because they needed to invest a lot of working capital. With much effort and the help of his old parents, he was able to move forward and today has a one of the best land. His vegetables are very good quality, which he says is due to the constant irrigation they receive, since the business has a complete underground irrigation system.  Now his monthly income makes 250 AZN. 

They sell their products in the fruit and vegetable market of the city. Seyran requests a loan of 1200 AZN for the purchase of fertilizer and seeds. This will allow him to better provide for his family.
